title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Vladimir Manyukhin
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 132 – September 2017 Cover Art Ritual The works of Russian artist Vladimir Maniukhin are well-known to fans of post-apocalyptic art. He started painting at a young age and among his influences lists old, classic fiction--books, and films. His work has also been featured in Vostok Game's Survarium. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
text:
Skip to content
Issue 132 – September 2017
Cover Art
Ritual
The works of Russian artist Vladimir Maniukhin are well-known to fans of post-apocalyptic art. He started painting at a young age and among his influences lists old, classic fiction--books, and films. His work has also been featured in Vostok Game's Survarium.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Ritual by Vladimir Manyukhin
